recto.line: ṣle ta ŚŚA ntse ī ke ne • ywā rtta¯ ¯Ś pi ṅKAṃ sa lyi tsai yo ñyai ne •
skna ta tteṃ śco twe ñī yai tko rsa • maṃ tpyā¯ ¯M kuce ke re ptaṃ ññe • [cā] ··a
śā mna • wī • yu rpā ṣkai [n]e • lye [we] TA¯ ¯R • ṣe • wa śaṃ pi le ñe¯ ¯M [•] [ś]·

transcription.prose:
ṣletaśśäntse īkene • ywārttaś piṅkäṃ salyitsai yoñyaine •
sknatatteṃśco twe ñī yaitkorsa • maṃt pyām kUce kereptaṃññe • cā ··a
śāmna • wī • yurpāṣkaine • lyewetär • ṣe • waśaṃpile ñem • ś·

line.tr: «(Ṣletaś) lui-même a déclaré (l'attestation)»
«des hommes – deux; à Yurpāṣka est envoyé – un – appelé Waśaṃpile»

provenance.repository: Bibliothèque nationale de France, fonds Pelliot Koutchéen (Paris)

recto.line: ywā rtta¯ ¯Ś pi ṅKAṃ • sa lyi tsai yo ñyai [ne] [k]*[e] ma
meṃ i yaṃ • ceṃ mpa śā mna • e ṣe meṃ śa¯ ¯K • ya kwi e ṣṣe meṃ •
pi¯ ¯Ś o kso ṣe • te pa rra tā rka ya tsi au ṣa¯ ¯P mā TA rka
na¯ ¯T • i KAṃ kṣu ntsa • ṣu kta ñce ¯K śtwe rne • yo

transcription.prose:
ywārttaś piṅkäṃ • salyitsai yoñyaine k(ṣ)ema(tewo)
rśaiśco • twe ñī yai(tko)r(sa) (mant) (pyām) (•) (ñake) (se) ya(rkā)ṃ
…meṃ iyaṃ • ceṃmpa śāmna • eṣemeṃ śak • yakwi eṣṣemeṃ •
piś okso ṣe • te parra tārka yatsi auṣap mā tärka
nat • ikäṃ kṣuntsa • ṣuktañce (meṃne) (śa)k śtwerne • yo

line.tr: Ywārttaś schreibt an Kṣema[te]rśai bei der salzigen Zollstelle.
Ywārttaś is writing to Kṣema[te]rśai at the salty toll gate.
«avec celui-ci, des hommes – en tout dix [i.e. lui et dix compagnons], des chevaux – en tout cinq, bœuf – un»

provenance.repository: Bibliothèque nationale de France, fonds Pelliot Koutchéen (Paris)

recto.line: [tr]· kṣu n· [s]a dha rma ca ndri lā nti kṣuṃ ne dha rma mi tri yo tko la rñ· ne sa ṅkrā mä ṣṭa lā ṣṭi ya śu na nti wai pu ṇy[i] se ne śa tre [ṣ]ṣ· wy[ai] u tpā tä ke śtā seṃ te ṣo tri
ṣṭa [l]ā ṣṭi [n]meṃ ma ṅka rā ñca na ā ka wa rpā mte ca ka nma 2 100 60 4
[la] kṣa meṃ [ā] ka ka mā mte ca ka nma 50-1
[o] [k]o [ṣṣ]· [ya] śu na nti ñya na ā ka wa rpā mte ca ka nma 20 8
no [ya] śu na nti meṃ o ko ṣṣai lye kśai wa rpā mte ca ka nma 10 4 to wa 6 || ṣe ke śne ā ka ma ṅka rā ñca na ta k[ā] re ca ka nma 3 100 50 7 to wa 6
ñwe ma ṣṣa na [ṣa] ñä cma lya na ā ka ta kā re ca ka nma 4 100 50 2 to 9
po ṣe ke [ś]n[e] ce ma ṅka rā ñca na ce ñwe ma ṣṣa na ā ka ca ka nma 8 100 [10] to wa 5
|| || [cma] [lya] [na] [ā] ka w[y]ai ta kā re te ṣo tri || ||

verso.line: ka pyā re sä me ñi ye ya pwsa mä ca ka nma 100 30 8 to wa 4
po pi ku lä ma swā rtta ne kṣu trä ya pla śä ca ka nma 5 100 20 6 to [4]
po ṣe ke śne ya pwyai tā ka ca ka nma 1000 40 8 to wa 8
|| || ya ka lyī pä rya pca ka nma 2 100 50 5 to wa 7 || ||
·ñ· ys· [r]e ś· [t]ā s· ca ka nma 70
tsä rko rtta ne ysā re śi [t]ā sä ca ka nma 60
tau rri y[ai] ysā re śi [t]ā sä ca ka nma 10 7
ṣe ke śne ysā re keṃ nne śi [t]ā sca ka nma 100 40 7
umā tśi tse ysā re pe ri wsa mä ca ka nma 100 40 to wa 4
śa tre wa rpo ṣṣä sä ysā re maṃ nte wsa mä ca ka nma 4 100 90 3
kṣu trä ysā re la śca ka nma 40 6 to wa 4
po ṣe ke śne ysā re wyai tā ka ca ka nma 8 100 60 2 to wa 9 || ya ka lyī pä ry·ā ·e«·» « »«50» «4» «to» «wa» «5»

transcription.prose:
tr(ai) kṣun(t)sa dharmacandri lānti kṣuṃne dharmamitri yotkolarñ(e)ne saṅkrām«†ä» ṣṭalāṣṭi yaśunanti wai puṇyisene śatreṣṣ(e) wyai utpāt«†ä» keś tāseṃ te ṣotri
ṣṭalāṣṭinmeṃ maṅkarāñcana āka warpāmte cakanma 2-100-60-4
lakṣa meṃ āka kamāmte cakanma 50-1
okoṣṣ(ana) yaśunantiñyana āka warpāmte cakanma 20-8
(na)no yaśunantimeṃ okoṣṣai lyekśai warpāmte cakanma 10-4 towa 6 || ṣe keśne āka maṅkarāñcana takāre cakanma 3-100-50-7 towa 6
ñwemaṣṣana ṣañ«†ä» cmalyana āka takāre cakanma 4-100-50-2 to(wa) 9
po ṣe keśne ce maṅkarāñcana ce ñwemaṣṣana āka cakanma 8-100-10 towa 5
|| || cmalyana āka wyai takāre te ṣotri || ||
/// (w)s(a)m«†ä» c(a)k(a)nm(a) 2-100-30-7 t(owa) ///
kapyāres«†ä» meñiye yap wsam«†ä» cakanma 100-30-8 towa 4
po pikul«†ä» maswārttane kṣuträ yap laś«†ä» cakanma 5-100-20-6 to(wa) 4
po ṣe keśne yap wyai tāka cakanma 1000-40-8 towa 8
|| || yaka lyīpär yap cakanma 2-100-50-5 towa 7 || ||
·ñ· ys(ā)re ś(i)tās cakanma 70
tsärkorttane ysāre śitās«†ä» cakanma 60
taur riyai ysāre śitās«†ä» cakanma 10-7
ṣe keśne ysāre keṃnne śitās cakanma 100-40-7
umātśitse ysāre peri wsam«†ä» cakanma 100-40 towa 4
śatre warpoṣṣäs«†ä» ysāre maṃnte wsam«†ä» cakanma 4-100-90-3
kṣuträ ysāre laś cakanma 40-6 towa 4
po ṣe keśne ysāre wyai tāka cakanma 8-100-60-2 towa 9 || yaka lyīpär y(s)ā(r)e (cakanma) 50-4 towa 5

line.tr: In the 3rd regnal year of the king Dharmacandre*, the monastery is during the term of Yotkolau occupied by Dharmamitre*. Ṣṭalāṣṭi, Yaśunanti and Puṇyisene counted the expense and revenue of grain. This is the sign.
From the side of Ṣṭalāṣṭi, we have received/gained old millet ā.: 264 piculs.
From the side of [La]kṣa-?, we have taken millet ā.: 51 piculs.
We have received/gained fresh millet ā. (grown in the field) of Yaśunanti: 28 piculs.
[Moreover], from the side of Yaśunanti, we have received/gained fresh millet l.: 14 piculs, 6 pecks. || In total, the old millet ā. is: 357 piculs, 6 pecks.
The new produced millet ā. is: 452 piculs, 9 [pecks].
In [total], the old and the fresh millet ā.: 810 piculs, 5 pecks.
|| || This is the expense of [produced millet ā.]. This is the sign. || ||
/// [we have given ... : 237 piculs, ... peck(s).
... wheat, to/of śi[t]ā*: 70 piculs.
We have given monthly barley to kapyāres: 138 piculs, 4 pecks.
In Tsärkortta*, wheat, to/of śi[t]ā*: 60 piculs.
(In) the whole year, in Maswārtta*, miscellaneous barley has been spent: 526 piculs, [4 pecks.]
Taur-[city/town?], wheat, to/of śi[t]ā*: 17 piculs.
In total, the barley expense is: 1048 piculs, 8 pecks.
In total, the wheat in the fields to/of śi[t]ā*: 147 piculs.
|| || Still (there is) remainder (of) barley: 255 piculs, 7 pecks. || ||
We have given wheat to be paid to uMātśi*: 140 piculs, 4 pecks.
We have given wheat to the beneficiaries of grain: 493 piculs.
Miscellaneous wheat has been spent: 46 piculs, 4 pecks.
In total, the expense of wheat is: 862 piculs, 9 pecks. || Still (there) is remainder of [wheat]: 54 (piculs), 5 pecks.

comments.comment: One may read either [la]kṣana – meṃ or [la]kṣata – meṃ ().
One may read either śitāsä or śināsä ().
